SELECT u.name, ud.image, ud.followers, sl.regdate, ap.product_count, yp.total_payment FROM users u JOIN userdetails ud ON u.username = ud.username JOIN shoplist sl ON u.username = sl.username LEFT JOIN (SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM allproduct WHERE grade < 200 GROUP BY username) ap ON u.username = ap.username LEFT JOIN (SELECT username, SUM(totalprice) AS total_payment FROM ${username}_payment WHERE status = 102 GROUP BY username) yp ON u.username = yp.username WHERE u.username = #{username}
